meanings.definition: A skin condition characterized by flaking or scaling
meanings.sent1: My brother has pityriases on his scalp, causing flakes in his hair.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with pityriases after noticing the skin flakes.
meanings.sent3: The pityriases on my skin make it look like I have a snowstorm on my body!
meanings.sent4: Her pityriases were like tiny pieces of paper falling from the sky.
meanings.sent5: The pityriases on his face were so visible, it seemed like he had a second skin peeling off.
